com.inlocomedia.android.ads.notification

Class NotificationAdRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inlocomedia.android.ads.notification.NotificationAdRequest

  • public class NotificationAdRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The request that is used on the NotificationAd Manager to decide when to request or show advertisements

        public boolean isAskForPermissionEnabled()
        Gets the state of location permission requests (Enabled/Disabled).
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled, otherwise returns false.
